page.title: 01GLAMIS AREA - INTRODUCTION
page.content:
The area contained within our twelve map squares lies in the Parish of Glamis, Angus. There are two small villages, Glamis and Charleston but otherwise the area is farm land or forestry plantations. There are several farms wholly or partly within the area.
It is therefore an essentially rural area, but not remote. The city of Dundee lies to the south, and Perth to the west. The country towns of Forfar and Kirriemuir are within five miles of Glamis. There is good road communication between this area and the nearby towns, with the A94 main road (from Perth to Forfar and Aberdeen) crossing the A928 (from Dundee to Kirriemuir) at Glamis.
